name: International Airlines Group
goal:
International Airlines Group is the parent company of Aer Lingus, British Airways, Iberia, Vueling and their subsidiaries including those operating the LEVEL airline brand.

IAG combines the leading airlines in the Ireland, Spain and the UK enabling them to enhance their presence in the aviation market while retaining their individual brands and operations.
interests: Business and Industry, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Any EU Legislation affecting the operation of any of the operating companies of IAG particularly therefore in the field of air transport.
